categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Ranna was a female Human who served as a sergeant in the Imperial Army of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War with the Galactic Republic. She was stationed aboard Vaiken Spacedock.

Sergeant Ranna appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as the PvP Warzone Enhancements vendor for Imperial players on Vaiken Spacedock. She was later removed in Game Update 5.0 on November 29, 2016, which retired the PvP and PvE gear vendors in favor of the Command system.
